page.title: 01Barnt Green 1985
page.content: The villages of Barnt Green,Cofton Hackett and Hopwood are situated in the North Eastern part of the County of Hereford and Worcester. Barnt Green and Hopwood are surrounded by{farmland}and have{no industry nearby. Farming and a few local services and trades provide employment for some of the people.To the south of Cofton Hackett the situation is similar to Barnt Green and Hopwood but to the north there are large industries and the connurbation of Birmingham. The three villlages have changed little recently. There has been no major house building programme for a number of years. The only change in the landscape is the construction of the M 42 Motorway.
